item.title: By: Evan Weinberg
item.dc:creator: Evan Weinberg
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2015/09/02/teaching-from-anywhere/#comment-396">John Burk</a>.
I like this - just the sort of thing I'd bet I could find in a night market.
After reading your comment, I took the time to be aware of whether I actually spent much time using the trackpad alone, and saw that it wasn't actually that frequent. This is worth a look. Thanks for the suggestion, John.
